reviews.review_msg: Rarely do you find as good of a communicator of information as Antone Minard. Not only is he evidently pasionate about what he teaches, but does his best to involve the class' thoughts and push students to consider interesting themes. He expects a lot of you in the best possible way; definitely one of the best profs I've ever had.

Dr. Minard was absolutely awesome, you can tell that he really cares a lot about the subject matter he teaches. He has a crazy wide range of knowledge that he is happy to share with any of his students. He provides excellent feedback. Overall I would highly recommend taking one of his courses, he is a great lecturer and his assignments are fair.
